items.sentence: No matter who you ask, you won't be able to get a satisfactory answer.
I haven't seen you in a while, so I thought I'd drop by and say hello.
Build a better mousetrap, and the world will beat a path to your door.
A ship in the harbor is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
I didn't like Tom right away, but eventually, I fell in love with him.
I think that we may have something that you'd be interested in buying.
I think that it's highly unlikely Tom will ever face criminal charges.
When I take a deep breath, a pain runs down the right side of my back.
I didn't accept that job because I was holding out for a better offer.
Tom crumpled the paper up into a ball and threw it into the trash can.
I want to buy a car, but I don't have enough money for a down payment.
The inhabitants of the village built a wooden bridge across the river.
I didn't want to live in Australia anymore, so I moved to New Zealand.
I've something interesting to tell you that you might find surprising.
Tom wondered why Mary didn't have to go to Boston like everybody else.
I knew Tom would have to stay in Boston longer than he had planned to.
Tom doesn't have any idea where Mary is planning on staying in Boston.
Tom had to drop out of college because he couldn't afford the tuition.
I was surprised when Tom said that he was planning to go to Australia.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary still wanted to go to Australia.
